item.title: How to Build a $20k/Month Website Business: A Complete Guide
item.description: Introduction Want to know how some people make doctor-level income selling websites? The secret isn’t in creating complex custom websites from scratch - it’s in working smarter with templates and providing real value to local businesses. This guide breaks down a proven process that has helped people transition from struggling freelancers to successful digital entrepreneurs. The Core Problem with Traditional Freelancing Many freelance web developers face a common challenge: income inconsistency.
